info.name: IDG.se – Centered without ads [Read Description]
info.description: This is just a basic style to center the whole page and removes them annoying ads. Now also supports all the sister domains.   They updated their design, so this fix is no longer useful!   =================== Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431
info.additionalInfo:
Aug 16, 2013 - initial release
Aug 16, 2014 - now working with all the sister domains which also are centered without ads
